name: Alexland
startIntroPart2: This is an overpowered joke nation just as an example for the mods feature. Set Phasers to Obliterate!!
declaringWar: I have planned this for a long time >:3c… ¡Prepárate para la batalla!
attacked: Yo! Why? I haven’t done anything to you… at least not yet. Anyways, prepare to die now >:3
defeated: Welp, time to stop playing this game for today. Go and conquer the entire world now, or something. Adios :3
introduction: ¡¡¡Hola!!! I’m Alex! Welcome to my empire! I hope we have a great time together :3
hateLetsHearIt: C'mon.. I don’t have all day
afterPeace: GRACIAS! I was about to collapse in like 2 or 3 turns
tradeRequest: Olle bestie, do you like this?
uniques: [+50 Gold] for discovering a Natural Wonder (bonus enhanced to [+250 Gold] if first to discover it)
[+1 Happiness] for every known Natural Wonder
